19271.「お前さんのおかげで 準備も ととのった。\n いよいよ 伐採同盟と対決！:
Thanks to you, we're all set. Now it's time to
face the logging alliance!

19272.「……と言いたいところだが\n じつは 困ったことが 起こってのう。: I'd like to say that I'm in trouble.

19273.「見張りに出ていった ユウギリが\n いつまでたっても 戻らんので\n レーノス:
Yugiri went out on guard duty, but he never
came back, so I sent Renosu to check on him.

19274.「そしたら ケガを負った様子のユウギリが\n 伐採同盟のアジトに 連れ込まれると:
Then he saw Yugiri, who appeared to be
injured, being taken into the logging
alliance's hideout.

19275.「もうすぐ 本部の援軍も 来るというのに\n ユウギリを 人質に取られていては\:
Reinforcements from headquarters will be
arriving soon, but with Yugiri as a hostage,
we can't do anything... what can we do?

19276.「支部長！\n 同盟の連中 動きだしましたぜ！: Branch Manager! The Alliance is on the move!

19277.「今度は えらく 気合いの入った様子の出発だ。\n 連中 本格的に伐採を 始める:
This time, they are very enthusiastic about
the departure. They're going to start logging
in earnest!

19279.「よし こうしよう！\n わしは ここに残り 本部からの援軍が\n 来るのを 待:
All right, here's the plan! I will stay here
and wait for reinforcements to arrive from
headquarters.

19280.「そして 彼らが到着したら\n 伐採同盟の連中が 向かった先に\n 行ってもらう:
And when they arrive, we'll ask them to go
where the logging allies are headed!

19281.「レーノスと <pc>。\n お前さんたちは ヤツらのアジトに潜入し\n 囚われ:
Renosu and <pc>. You must infiltrate
their hideout and rescue Yugiri from
captivity!

19282.「今なら アジトに使われている\n 森外れのほら穴の守りも うすいはず。\n ど:
The Outer Forest Cave used as a hideout should
be less protected now. What do you think? Will
you accept this mission?

19283.「では 頼んだぞ レーノス。<pc>。\n 今回ばかりは わしも ダジャレ無しの:
Well, then, you're in good hands, Renosu.
<pc>. For once, I'm in serious mode,
no pun intended!

19284.「よし！ 伐採同盟のアジトは\n モリナラ大森林の奥にある 森外れのほら穴だ。\:
All right! The logging alliance's hideout is
Outer Forest Cave, deep in the Molinara
Forest. I'll go ahead! You follow me!

19285.「では 頼んだぞ……と思ったら\n なんじゃ その 頼まれごとの数は！？:
Now, I'm going to ask you for a favor... but
what's with all the favors you're getting?

19286.「それでは 仕事のひとつも 頼めんぞ！\n ええい。さっさと 手を空けてくるのじ:
I can't ask you to do a single job for me
then! No. Go get your hands off of it!

19287.「チッ！ これだから シロートはよ。\n もういい。オレは ひとりでも行く！\n:
Tsk! That's why Shirouto's here. That's
enough. I'll go alone! You do what you want!

19288.「いい作戦だと 思うんじゃがのう。\n いったい 何が気に入らないと言うんじゃ？:
I think it's a good strategy. What the hell is
wrong with you?

19289.「チッ！ こんなときに ビビリかよ。\n もういい。オレは ひとりでも行く！\n:
Tsk! You're a coward at a time like this.
That's enough. I'll go alone! You do what you
want!

19290.「あんた方 こんなところまで\n なんの用で 来なすったのかね？: What brings you all this way?

19291.「なんの用か……だと！？\n お前たちに 囚われた仲間を\n 助けにきたに 決ま:
What do you want...? Of course I'm here to
rescue my companions who are being held
captive by you!

19293.「トボけてんじゃねえ！\n ここが 伐採同盟のアジトで\n オメーらが その一員:
Don't play dumb with me! We know this is a
logging alliance and you're a part of it!

19296.「……いかにも わしらは 伐採同盟を\n 名乗っております。しかし その実体は\:
We call ourselves a logging alliance. But in
reality, we are a group of refugees with old
men and children.

19297.「わしらは もともと このエルトナ大陸に\n 移民してきた 木こりの集団でしてな:
We are a group of lumberjacks who originally
immigrated to Eltona Continent. We made our
living by cultivating a certain forest.

19298.「ところが その森が 魔瘴に侵されましてな。\n 生活の糧を失った わしらは モ:
However, the forest was invaded by demon miasma. Losing our livelihood, we had no choice but to settle down in the Molinara
Forest.

19299.「……あんたらの事情は わかったけどな。\n うちの仲間を さらっておいて\n:
I understand your situation. But it's not nice
to play the victim when you kidnapped one of
our companions.

19301.「その人たちは 私を さらったりなんて\n してませんよぅ。\n ただ 助けてく: They didn't kidnap me. They just helped me!

19302.「無事だったのか ユウギリ。\n ……いったい どういうことだよ？:
Are you all right, Yugiri? What the hell is
going on?

19303.「私 このアジトを見張る任務の途中で\n 魔物に襲われて ケガしちゃったんです。:
I was on a mission to guard this hideout when
I was attacked by a monster and injured. So
the people here took care of me...

19304.「どうやら そのときの様子を見られて\n 誤解なさったようですな。\n ……まあ:
It seems that you misunderstood me because of
the way I looked at you at that time. Well,
that's understandable.

19305.「伐採同盟の人たち 悪い人じゃないんです。\n おたがい 相手の事情を 知らなか:
The people in the logging alliance are not bad people. We just didn't know each other's situation, but if we talk it out, I'm sure we
can work something out!

19306.「悪いが そりゃもう 遅いってもんだぜ。\n 今ごろ 本部からの援軍と 同盟の連:
I'm sorry, but it's a little late for that. By
now, the reinforcements from headquarters and
the allies must have started a big battle.

19307.「そ そんなぁ……。\n いや！ こうしちゃいられません！\n そんなの 絶対止:
Oh, no, no, no, no, no! I can't do this! You
have to stop that! You have to stop that!

19308.「オレたちでか？\n んなの無理に決まってんだろ！\n もし 止められるヤツが:
By ourselves? Of course we can't! If there's
anyone who can stop it...

19309.「そこの 選ばれし レンジャーだけだろうぜ。: I'm sure it's just a select few rangers there.

19310.「……そうね。\n <pc>なら もしかして……。:
I guess... I think <pc> might be able
to...

19311.「とにかく 同盟の人たちを追いましょ！\n たぶん 前に 彼らが伐採を行っていた:
Anyway, let's go after the allies! Maybe
they're going to Molinara Square, where they
used to do their logging!

19312.「これでも 期待してるんだからよ……\n 裏切らないでくれよな。: I'm still counting on you... don't betray me.

19313.「……やれやれ 頼られる立場ってのは\n つらいもんだな 相棒。:
It's hard to be in a position where you have
to depend on someone, isn't it, buddy?

19314.「それにしても 今日の森は\n どーも ザワザワしてんだよな……。\n なんだか:
But the forest today is so noisy... I feel so
restless and I don't want to be.

19315.「みんな やめてーっ！！\n 話し合えば きっと わかりあえるよっ！:
Guys, stop it! If we talk, we'll understand
each other!

19316.「……いや 様子が おかしいぜ。: No, there's something wrong with you.

19317.「ピッピピピピピピピピピピピピピピピピピピ。\n ギュオン！ ギュオォォォォォォ:
Beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep. Gyuuong! G
yuoooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo
ooooooooooooooo!

19318.「な なんだ コイツ！？\n 突然 おかしな動きを……。:
What the hell is this? Suddenly, it's moving
in a strange way...

19319.「くそっ！ 言うこと 聞きゃあしねえ。\n ブッ壊れちまった……。: Damn it! He won't listen to me. I'm broken...

19321.「ピッピピピピピピピピピピピピピピピピピピ。\n ギュオン！ ギュオォォォォォォ:
Beep, beep, beep, beep, beep, beep. Gyuuong! G
yuoooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo
ooooooooooooooo!

19324.伐採マシン改は 森に つっこみ\n大爆発した！:
The Choppin Machine v2 crashed into the forest
and blew up!

19325.「あわわわわ……。\n モリナラ大森林が 燃えちゃうっ！: Awww... the Molinara Forest is on fire!

19326.「オメーらっ 争うのは 後だ！\n 今は 協力して 森を炎から 守るぞ！:
Hey, you guys, we'll fight later! For now, we
must work together to save the forest from the
flames!

19327.「ヤベえぜ こりゃ。\n 何かが…………くるっっ！！: Oh, man, this is bad. Something's... coming!

19328.<center>……ヒトよ。\nここは お前たちの領域に非ず。:
This is not your domain, human. This is not
your domain.

19329.そのとき モリナラ大森林の中を\n一陣の風が 吹きぬけた。:
At that moment, a gust of wind blew through
the Molinara Forest.

19330.その突風は 燃えさかる炎を 消しとめ\n辺り一帯に 深い静寂を もたらした。:
The gust of wind extinguished the flames and
brought a deep silence to the area.

19332.「このモリナラ大森林に宿る 精霊たちの\n はげしい 怒りと 憎しみが\n 今の:
The fierce anger and hatred of the spirits
that dwell here in the Molinara Forest is what
makes the winds blow the way they do now...

19333.「戦っちゃいけねえぞ 相棒！\n こいつらは レーノスや ユウギリ嬢ちゃんの\n:
Don't fight them, buddy! They're the altered
forms of Renosu and Miss Yugiri...

19334.「森の怒りにふれた者は すべて\n 森の魔物に 姿を変えられちまうんだ！:
Anyone who touches the forest's wrath is
transformed into a forest monster!

19335.「……そうだ 支部長に報告しようぜ！\n あの おっさんなら なんとかする方法を:
I say we report this to the branch manager.
Maybe that old man will know how to do
something about it.

19336.「わしらのことは 気になさらず\n 早く 行って 争いを止めてくだされ！:
Don't worry about us, just go and stop the
fighting!

19337.「た 大変だ 支部長のおっさん！\n 森の精霊たちが 怒りだして\n みんな じ:
Oh, my God, the old branch chief! The spirits
of the forest got angry and turned everyone
into human heads!

19338.「……やはり 先ほど感じた\n 異様な 森のざわめきは\n そういうことであった:
I guess that was the reason for the strange
rustling in the forest I had felt earlier.

19339.「モリナラの自然を守って ３０年。\n この日の来ないことを 祈っておったが\n:
Thirty years of protecting the nature of
Molinara. I prayed this day would never come,
but it has, until Renosu and Yugiri...

19340.「知ってたのかよ おっさん！？\n もしかして どうしたら あいつらを\n 元に:
You knew, old man? Do you have any idea what
it would take to get them back?

19341.「方法が ないわけではない……はずじゃ。\n だが それは 危険をともなう。\n:
There is a way...there must be a way. But it
is dangerous. It is not something that can be
easily taught.

19342.「おっさんの部下だって 巻き込まれてんのに\n そんなこと言ってる場合かよ！\n:
Even the old man's men are involved, but this
is no time to talk like that! Then what are we
going to do?

19343.「そうじゃな。<pc>が \n 充分にチカラをつけ 時が満ちたら\n カミハル:
That's right. When <pc> is strong
enough and the time is right, you will go to
Kamiharmui's headquarters.

19344.「そのとき お前さんに 資格ありと\n 本部が認めれば 精霊たちの怒りを\n 鎮:
At that time, if Headquarters deems you
qualified, you will be taught how to appease
the spirits' wrath.

19345.「とにかく 今は どうにもならん。\n とりあえず これを受け取りなさい。:
Anyway, I can't help you now. In the meantime,
take this.

19346.「<pc>が 森の怒りから逃れられたのは\n その身体に スピルどのを宿す\n:
The only reason <pc> was able to
escape the wrath of the forest was because he
was the chosen ranger with Spiel in his body.

19347.「その お前さんならば きっと\n 今の状況も どうにか できる……。\n わし:
I am sure that you will be able to handle the
current situation... I have faith in that.

19348.「ここにいても あいつらを\n 助けることはできそうにねえ……。\n くやしいけ:
I don't think we're going to be able to help
these guys if we stay here... it sucks, but
let's get back to it now, buddy.
